name: The Tower (itch) (seth9841)
description:
The Tower is a puzzle game in which you must explore various realms to uncover the magic that will make your wish a reality. Lost and confused, you must venture deep into places unknown to you and unlock ancient gateways that will lead you to your destination. There is no turning back now, and should you fail to solve the puzzles laid out before you, you may never find your way out.

Designed by students in the University of Utah's Entertainment Arts & Engineering program. 

Made by:

Matthew Johnson - Programming

Steven Tasmin - Programming

Cameron Hoy - 3D Artist

Seth Hemphill - 3D Artist

Connor Wood - Concept Artist
